executable.title: Spatially Transform Tubes (TubeTK)
executable.description: Applies a transform / displacement field to tubes (i.e., spatial objects).
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

string.name: transformFile
string.description: Transform to apply (in ITK format). NOTE: In case a displacement field is specified, any additional transforms are currently ignored!

string.name: displacementField
string.description: Specify the displacement field (e.g., generated using ANTS).

boolean.name: useInverseTransform
boolean.label: Use the inverse of the loaded transform
boolean.description: Instead of using the transform directly, compute it's inverse and apply. NOTE: In case of an displacement field, the USER is responsible to input the inverse displacement field!
